snippet.title: Grunn - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Our very normal gardening game Grunn is coming to PC via Steam & Itch.io on October 4th, 2024!

Wishlist it here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2720950

Grunn is a very normal gardening game. You’ve been hired to work on a garden deep in the Dutch countryside. There’s plenty to do: trim the grass, water the flowers, pick up trash, and of course enjoy the lovely scenery. Except… Most of your tools are missing. The owner isn’t around. Going out after dark is forbidden. And no matter where you go, you can't escape the sense you're being watched.

You have until Monday to complete the job. Good luck!
